about.title: About Us
about.content:
3ON Mobile Carwash brings professional car washing services directly to your doorstep. Our team of experienced professionals uses eco-friendly products and state-of-the-art equipment to ensure your vehicle receives the best care possible.

We believe in convenience without compromising quality. Whether you're at home, at work, or anywhere in the UAE, we come to you.

Our mission is to provide exceptional car care services while being environmentally responsible. We use water-efficient techniques and biodegradable cleaning products to minimize our environmental footprint.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At 3ON Mobile Carwash, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your data when you use our mobile car wash services in the United Arab Emirates.
privacy.section1Text: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you create an account, make a booking, or communicate with us. This includes personal and service-related data necessary to deliver our mobile car wash services.
privacy.dataItem1: Personal Information: Full name, phone number, and email address (optional)
privacy.dataItem2: Location Data: Your service location address and GPS coordinates for accurate service delivery
privacy.dataItem3: Vehicle Information: Vehicle type, size, and license plate number (optional)
privacy.dataItem4: Booking History: Service records, preferences, and loyalty program progress
privacy.section2Text: We use your personal information to provide and improve our services. This includes processing your bookings, sending appointment confirmations and reminders via SMS or WhatsApp, tracking your loyalty rewards, providing customer support, sending promotional offers and updates (with your consent), and analyzing usage patterns to enhance our service quality.
privacy.section3Text: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your data with payment processors to complete transactions securely, service partners who assist in delivering our services, and legal authorities when required by UAE law or to protect our rights.
privacy.section4Text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encrypted data transmission, secure server infrastructure, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.section5Text: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services to you. Booking records are kept for a minimum of 2 years for business and legal purposes. You may request deletion of your data at any time, subject to legal retention requirements.
privacy.section6Text: Under UAE data protection regulations, you have the right to access your personal data and obtain a copy, correct inaccurate or incomplete information, request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal requirements), withdraw consent for marketing communications at any time, and lodge a complaint with relevant data protection authorities.
privacy.section7Text: Our app may use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze app usage. You can manage cookie preferences through your device settings.
privacy.section8Text: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected data from a minor, please contact us immediately.
privacy.section9Text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy in the app and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
privacy.section10Text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your data rights, please contact us at info@3on.ae or call +971 58 590 8876.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to 3ON Mobile Carwash. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our mobile car wash services in the United Arab Emirates. By booking or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.section1Text: By booking a service with 3ON Mobile Carwash, you agree to provide accurate location information and contact details, ensure your vehicle is accessible at the scheduled time and location, grant our staff reasonable access to perform the requested services, and be present or available by phone during the service appointment.
terms.section2Text: Bookings can be made through our mobile app, website, or WhatsApp. All bookings are subject to availability. Free cancellation is available up to 2 hours before your scheduled appointment. Cancellations made less than 2 hours before the appointment may incur a cancellation fee of AED 25. No-shows without prior notice will be charged 50% of the booking value. We reserve the right to cancel or reschedule bookings due to adverse weather conditions or unforeseen circumstances.
terms.section3Text: Payment can be made via cash upon service completion or through our secure online payment link. All prices are displayed in UAE Dirhams (AED) and include 5% VAT. Prices may vary based on vehicle size and selected package. Payment is due upon completion of service. We accept cash, credit cards, and digital payment methods.
terms.section4Text: Our loyalty program rewards regular customers with a free wash after every 6 paid washes. Free washes are automatically applied to your 7th booking and cannot be combined with other offers. Loyalty progress is tracked per registered phone number. Rewards are non-transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the loyalty program with reasonable notice.
terms.section5Text: We strive to provide high-quality service on every visit. If you are not satisfied with our service, please report any issues within 24 hours of service completion. We will review your concern and may offer a complimentary re-service at our discretion. Weather-related issues that affect service quality will be addressed on a case-by-case basis.
terms.section6Text: 3ON Mobile Carwash takes utmost care during all services. However, we are not liable for pre-existing damage to your vehicle (scratches, dents, paint issues), personal items left inside the vehicle, mechanical or electrical issues, or damage caused by factors beyond our control. We recommend documenting your vehicle's condition before service and informing our staff of any existing issues.
terms.section7Text: Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis. If a service cannot be completed due to our fault, a full refund will be issued. For partial service delivery, a proportional refund may be offered. Refund requests must be submitted within 48 hours of the scheduled appointment. Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days to the original payment method.
terms.section8Text: You are responsible for ensuring the service location is accessible and safe for our staff. We are not responsible for any parking fines, access fees, or penalties incurred during service delivery. Our staff will not service vehicles parked illegally or in restricted areas.
terms.section9Text: Any disputes arising from these terms or our services shall first be addressed through our customer service team at info@3on.ae. If a resolution cannot be reached, disputes shall be governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates and subject to the jurisdiction of Dubai courts.
terms.section10Text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Continued use of our services after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the new terms. We will notify users of significant changes through the app or via SMS.
terms.section11Text: For questions, concerns, or feedback regarding these terms or our services, please contact us at info@3on.ae, call +971 58 590 8876, or message us on WhatsApp.
